author: Peter Nicholas
title: Trump Aide Hope Hicks Declines to Answer Some Questions From House Panel
text:
WASHINGTON—White House Communications Director Hope Hicks, testifying before a House committee investigating Russia’s role in the 2016 election, discussed the presidential campaign but declined to answer questions about her work as one of President Donald Trump’s most trusted advisers, lawmakers said.
After hearing her refusal, Democrats on the House Intelligence Committee sought to subpoena Ms. Hicks on the spot, a step the panel took during an appearance last month by former senior White House aide Steve Bannon.
...
